articles.title: Riding the omicron variant waves: Health officials anticipate an increase in COVID-19 infections - The Republic
articles.description: Local health officials say they expect to see an increase in COVID-19 infections in the coming weeks as a more contagious version of the omicron variant that is already driving up cases in Europe and Asia makes its way across the United States.
